QuestData.Title: Behind Enemy Lines
QuestData.Description: All arrangements have been made to take you to where our spies are hiding. Just come see me when you're ready and we'll get you on your way.
QuestData.LogDescription: Speak to Veronia when you're ready to depart to Manaforge Coruu. Once there, speak to Caledis Brightdawn.$B$BCompleting quests for the Scryers will cause your Aldor reputation level to decrease.
QuestData.RewardText: Welcome, $c. Try not to give our position away.$B$BWe wouldn't last long if Kael's cronies sniff us out.
